article_title: Pope Francis tells new cardinals to be models of love, not brooding schemers
article_text:
Active RNS subscribers and members can view this content by logging-in here.

VATICAN CITY (RNS) Avoid “that smoldering anger which makes us brood over wrongs we have received," Francis told the new princes of the church. “No! This is unacceptable in a man of the church."

article_metadata.news_keywords: Beliefs, Institutions, Catholic, Christian, College of Cardinals, new cardinals, Pope Francis, reform, Roman Curia, Vatican
